note:
Hi,

I'm UK based
Retired
Love boats and dogs

Life long beleiever in Voting Reform in the UK.

That means I am not a total supporter af any existing political party but lean towards a wide choice of parties, and the freedom of any state to choose its own destiny.

Regarding wars, I usually avoid insulting leaders as they can easily be replaced by even worse committees who control them currently.

I like pictures of pets and am not offended easily.

I have a broad sense of humour.
